messages.message:
:wave: Hi all, I recently made a change to rename `jobs_v1`  in dogfood's database to `jobs`. This changed helped clean up some legacy cruft around the jobs table and bring dogfood's configuration in line with the configuration of most of the sandboxes.

However, if you're running your local environment against dogfood, you'll run into issues with `jobs_v1`. Please pull/rebase on the latest master as @Anil said to fix any issues, or reach out to me.

Sorry for the slow communication on this!
Is this table shared with UAT?
what service(s) need to be rebuilt? just `job-service`?
Just job service I believe, but I'll double check. If you're doing work with dbinit or dbupdate, those too.
